0.text: Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat whenever the enemy loses  sight of him or he activates  Void Assault. Unseen Threat: Kha'Zix empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal 14 − 116 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus magic damage and  slow them by 25% for 2 seconds.
0.html:
Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat whenever the enemy loses sight of him or he activates Void Assault.

Unseen Threat: Kha'Zix empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal 14 − 116 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus magic damage and slow them by 25% for 2 seconds.

Void Assault
slow

0.text: Passive: Kha'Zix considers any enemy unit to be Isolated if they are not nearby to one of their allies.  Taste Their Fear,  Evolved Reaper Claws, and  Evolved Spike Racks have special interactions against Isolated targets.
0.html: Passive: Kha'Zix considers any enemy unit to be Isolated if they are not nearby to one of their allies. Taste Their Fear, Evolved Reaper Claws, and Evolved Spike Racks have special interactions against Isolated targets.

Evolved Reaper Claws
Evolved Spike Racks

1.html: Active: Kha'Zix slashes the target enemy, dealing physical damage, increased by 110% against Isolated targets.

1.html: Kha'Zix heals himself if he is within the explosion.

0.text: Evolved Bonus: Void Spike now fires three clusters in a cone,  slows by 60% and  reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target nor provide Kha'Zix with additional healing.
0.html: Evolved Bonus: Void Spike now fires three clusters in a cone, slows by 60% and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target nor provide Kha'Zix with additional healing.

0.text: Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects. Evolving an ability causes him to enter a 2-second cast time. Kha'Zix cannot evolve while he is unable to cast abilities.
0.html: Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects. Evolving an ability causes him to enter a 2-second cast time. Kha'Zix cannot evolve while he is unable to cast abilities.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Sandswipe: Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 75 (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – SANDSWIPE:  Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 75 (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
